name: A.L.F.R.E.D 2017
description:
‘A.L.F.R.E.D’ has been selected as a Best Student Project finalist for the 2017 Unity Awards!

Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Play as a young girl, lost in a hostile world in the company of A.L.F.R.E.D, a butler bot who obeys the following law: Robots MUST save humans. You will be safe with him, but he may protect your human enemies as well

Platform : PC / Engine : Unity 3D
Number of players : 1

Producer : Hugo LEFEVRE
Game Design : Joseph REICHENBACH, Romain JAOUHAR-GAILLARD
Game Art : Garance ROYERE LEBIGRE, Nicolas THAM, Marion SPEISER
Game Programming : Delphine  MIGEOT de BARAN
Game Design & Programming : Song HUANG
Music & Sound Design : Alexandre de FRAMOND
